slide.title: Stored Arguments

example.title: You can store arguments in the database:

slide.example: mysql> CREATE TABLE dinner (dish varchar(255)); mysql> INSERT INTO dinner VALUES ('Soup Dumpling'); mysql> INSERT INTO dinner VALUES ('Salt-Baked Shrimp'); mysql> INSERT INTO dinner VALUES ('Steamed Whole Fish'); mysql> SELECT PHP(c,dish) FROM code, dinner; +--------------------+ | PHP(c,dish) | +--------------------+ | 13 | | SOUP DUMPLING | | soup dumpling | | 17 | | SALT-BAKED SHRIMP | | salt-baked shrimp | | 18 | | STEAMED WHOLE FISH | | steamed whole fish | +--------------------+
